response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product stands out not only in its functionality but also in its unique features that cater to a wide range of needs. Given its exceptional value and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $125. This is an opportunity to own a piece that exceeds expectations and adds significant value to your collection or usage. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 125}
